app_descript:
Quiz of Knowledge Game

Brief:
Quiz of Knowledge Game is the ultimate multiple-choice trivia quiz that challenges your general knowledge across a wide spectrum of subjects. With over 5,000 trivia questions spanning various categories, this engaging app allows you to compete against players worldwide, all while honing your knowledge in a fun, interactive way.

üìå Core Features:

  • 5,000+ Trivia Questions: Dive into a vast database of questions across 16 categories including history, sports, geography, and technology. üéâ
  • Multiple Difficulty Levels: Progress through 5 levels of increasing challenge, ensuring both novice and expert players can enjoy. üöÄ
  • Offline Playability: Enjoy the quiz anytime and anywhere, perfect for gaming on-the-go without needing an internet connection. üì±
  • World Leaderboard: Compare your scores with friends and global players, and see where you stand on the scoresheet. üåç
  • User-Generated Content: Contribute your own questions which, after review, can be added to enhance the quiz experience for all players. ‚úçÔ∏è

üëç Pros:

  • Frequent Updates: The app is regularly updated with new questions and categories, making sure your knowledge is always tested. üîÑ
  • Engaging Gameplay: Fast-paced trivia format keeps you on your toes with a 20-second time limit for each question. ‚è≥
  • Beautiful Graphics: User-friendly interface and appealing design enhance the overall gaming experience. üé®
  • Lightweight Application: Small size of just 4MB ensures fast downloads and easy installation on any device. üíΩ
  • Achievement Tracking: Unlock achievements to motivate ongoing learning and improvement in your trivia skills. üèÜ

üëé Cons:

  • Limited Lives: Players only have 3 lives per game, which can restrict gameplay for those who may need more attempts. ‚ùå
  • Android Exclusive: Currently, the app is only available for Android devices, limiting access for iOS users. üìµ
  • Time Limit Pressure: The 20-second timer might create stress for some players under pressure. ‚è≤Ô∏è
  • Variable Questions Quality: Since some questions may come from player submissions, quality can vary. üîÑ
  • No Multiplayer Mode: Lacks real-time multiplayer gaming options, limiting competitive play. üö´

üíµ Price:

The Quiz of Knowledge Game is free to download with optional in-app purchases available.
